text: fkdhdhabh ashraf qwmh, waqaluu leamthm: 'iinah 'iinsan mithlukum la ytmyaz eankum bshy', wala yurid biqawlih 'iilaa riasat wafadlaan elykm, walaw sha' allah 'an yursil 'iilayna rasulana larslh min almlaykt, ma samiena bimithl hdha fyman sbqna min aba' wajdad. wama nuh 'iilaa rajul bih mass min aljnwn, fantaziruu hataa yufyq, fytrk dewth, 'aw ymwt, ftstryhu mnh
